description: collection of videos extracted from watched videos by the oriane admin app. This collection is used for storing video's platform metadata, .i.e. likes, comments, views, etc. All comments of the videos + its hashtags are converted to embeddings for fast semantic search. For the video, the frames are extracted and stored in the watched_frames collection.

payload_indexes.description: deterministic uuid creatred from: user_id + upload_timestamp + vid/<filename>.<extension>
platform of the video, i.e. instagram, tiktok, youtube, etc.
unique code of the video by platform
number of likes on the video
number of comments on the video
number of views on the video

payload_data.description: path to the video in oriane-contents/<platform>/<video_code>/video.mp4 S3 bucket. TODO: change to CDN url once implemented
path to the thumbnail image in oriane-contents/<platform>/<video_code>/thumbnail.png S3 bucket. TODO: change to CDN url once implemented
duration of the video in seconds
size of the video in bytes
number of frames extracted from the video
